TextSpan

TextSpan

new TextSpan

The TextSpan constructor

Parameters:
Name Type Description
text String

The text content
Properties:
Name Type Description

supportedAttributes

 __list__ List of supported attribute names. In addition to the property names listed for DisplayObject, these are the attribute names you can pass to the attr() method. Note that this property is not available in your code, it's just here for documentation purposes.

Properties
Name Type Description
text string The text content.
fontSize number The font size. Default: 16
fontFamily string The font family Default: 'monospace'
fontStyle string The font style. Can be one of 'normal' or 'italic'. Default: 'normal'
fontWeight string The font weight. Can be one of 'normal' or 'bold'. Default: 'normal'
glyphx string An array of x offsets mapped to each individual glyph position
glyphy string An array of y offsets mapped to each individual glyph position
cap string The shape to be used at the end of open Path items, when they have a stroke. Can be one of 'round', 'square', 'butt'. Default: 'butt'
textFillColor string The fill color. Default: black.
join string The shape to be used at the corners of paths. Can be one of 'miter', 'round', 'bevel'. Default: 'miter'
textLineColor string The line color. Default: transparent
textLineWidth number The line width. Default: 0
miterLimit number The miter limit of the stroke. Default: 4
selectable number Boolean indicates whether the text is selectable or not

Extends

  • DisplayObject
